channel.title: Novice Questing
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape,
I'm going to be doing all of these quests, there all under the 'Novice' Category and are easy and short. It would be fun to do these with so if you need to do these quests feel free to join in just PM me what quest and we can get started.
[ul][li]Elemental Workshop 1.[/li] [li]Hazeel Cult.[/li] [li]Let Them Eat Pie.[/li] [li]Monk's Friend.[/li] [li]Nature Spirit.[/li] [li]Observatory Quest.[/li] [li]One Piercing Note.[/li] [li]Perils of Ice Mountain.[/li] [li]Rag and Bone Man.[/li] [li]Rune Mechanics.[/li] [li]Sheep Hearder.[/li] [li]A Soul's Bane.[/li] [li]Tower of Life.[/li][/ul]
Thanks,
Cool.

item.title: Novice Questing
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Hey MoparScape,

I’m going to be doing all of these quests, there all under the ‘Novice’ Category and are easy and short. It would be fun to do these with so if you need to do these quests feel free to join in just PM me what quest and we can get started.

[ul][li]Elemental Workshop 1.[/li]
[li]Hazeel Cult.[/li]
[li]Let Them Eat Pie.[/li]
[li]Monk’s Friend.[/li]
[li]Nature Spirit.[/li]
